lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Consumers and a splinter group of eight producers favoured redistribution of export shares using "objective criteria," which would likely have reduced Brazil's share.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Shortfalls of 200,000 bags offered by OAMCAF, the African and Malagasy Coffee Organization, and 20,000 bags offered by Angola, are also no longer valid, delegates said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazilian delegate Lindenberg Sette said that, if quota negotiations were to resume, the 1.0 mln bag shortfall Brazil was willing to give up in early March if the producer proposal was accepted would no longer be on the table.
